tasks.task: Breakfast + ~30 g protein (1 cup cooked dal ≈ 18 g, 100 g paneer ≈ 14 g, 250 ml milk ≈ 8 g)
Attend scheduled classes: DBMS 09:00‑10:00, UI/UX 10:00‑11:00, CG 12:00‑13:00, CN A1 Lab 14:00‑17:00
🔴 HIGH PRIORITY – Submit DW Project by 15:00
Roadmap study (Optimization Theory – convex sets, gradient descent, Lagrange multipliers + Advanced Python – generators, context managers, type hinting, profiling) – 60 min
Full‑Body Hypertrophy Circuit 17:30‑18:50 (10 min dynamic warm‑up, 3×15 kettlebell swings, 3×10 dumbbell clean & press)
Post‑workout protein snack (250 ml milk + 30 g soy protein powder) ≈ 20 g protein
Dinner + ~38 g protein (200 g paneer curry ≈ 28 g, 1 cup dal ≈ 10 g) with vegetables
Social media ≤ 30 min and drink 500 ml water
Prepare for next day & lights out – Sleep by 23:00
